channel.title: Dubsar News Feed
channel.description: Keep up with changes to the Dubsar Dictionary Project site.

item.title: Dubsar no longer on Coral
item.description: Dubsar&s performance on the Coral CDN was terrible. The experiment has been abandoned.

item.title: Dubsar subscribed links on Google
item.description: Dubsar now offers subscribed links on Google, so you can add selected Dubsar results to your web searches.

item.title: Dubsar on Coral CDN
item.description: Dubsar is trying out the Coral CDN. Please report any problems to dubsar@dubsar-dictionary.com.

item.title: Dubsar Release 1.0.2
item.description: Release 1.0.2 of Dubsar is available. This release provides a number of bug fixes, adds some missing content and integrates with social networks.

item.title: The Lost Sentences
item.description: Some sample verb sentences from WordNet® were accidentally left out of Dubsar. They've now been included. Look for them in the tooltips.

item.title: Dubsar Mobile Edition
item.description: Look for a mobile edition of Dubsar in 2011. In preparation for the project, the Dubsar team has to procure a better mobile device, but he's not allowed to buy himself anything till after Christmas. Happy Holidays!

item.title: RSS News Feed
item.description: Dubsar now has its own RSS news feed, making it easy to subscribe to these notifications.

item.title: Social Links
item.description: Dubsar now sports a number of social links near the top of the page, making it easy to share. Dubsar has also taken up residence on Facebook.

item.title: Link to Dubsar
item.description: Now it's easy to link to Dubsar from your website.

item.title: WordNet® Content
item.description: The entire content of WordNet® is now available in the application.
